Crit Effect

Type
Sorry! You hit and ally adjacent to your or an ally adjacent to the target.

Melee
Lost the Target You take a -2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Ranged
Sprain Until healed, you are clumsy 2.

Unarmed
Weakened You take -2 circumstance penalty to spell attack rolls and spell DC's until the end of your next turn.

name: Critical Fumble Deck #36
